A done deal: Red Sox, Dodgers make major trade

Beckett, Crawford, and Gonzalez head to LA

The deal is done but not yet announced. Josh Beckett has agreed to waive his 10-5 rights according to a MLB source and Carl Crawford agreed to the deal. (Globe)

Neil Armstrong, 1st man on the moon, dies at 82

Astronaut Neil Armstrong, the Apollo 11 commander, died today. He radioed Earth with the news of "one giant leap for mankind." (AP, 6:07 p.m.)
